title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.61 - Ex parte communications prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.61 - Ex parte communications prohibited

State Regulations
(a) Ex parte communication is prohibited with
respect to the merits of any case between any party to a proceeding and any
employee, officer, or member of the Board. (b) If any employee, officer, or member of
the Board receives an ex parte communication concerning the merits of a case, the employee, officer or member of the Board must promptly disclose the
communication and place it on the record of the proceeding, with any party
wishing to rebut the ex parte communication given the opportunity to do
so. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.61

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
